structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts
Disclaimer Of Certain Property Interest Act

law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 11. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] Except for the provisions of section eight, this chapter shall not abridge the right of any person to disclaim, waive, release, renounce, or abandon any interest in property under section fifteen of chapter one hundred and ninety-one or any other statute or rule of law.[ Chapter 192 effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 12. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.]
